text: Janet Hürlimann (née Omand) is a former Canadian-Swiss female curler and curling coach. She is a . ==Personal life== Hürlimann is married to fellow curler Patrick Hürlimann. They have three children, including Briar Hürlimann. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !width="60"|Season!!Skip!!Third!!Second!!Lead!!Alternate Coach!!Events |- | 1986-87 || Janet Omand || Audra Smith || Margaret Corey || Tracy Jackson || || CJCC 1987 |- | 1990-91 || Janet Hürlimann || Claudia Bärtschi || Jutta Tanner || Corinne Anneler || || SWCC 1991 (7th) |- | 1991-92 || Janet Hürlimann || Angela Lutz || Laurence Bidaud || Sandrine Mercier || || SWCC 1992 |- | 1992-93 || Janet Hürlimann || Angela Lutz || Laurence Bidaud || Sandrine Mercier || Laurence Morisetti || SWCC 1993 (7th) |- | 1997-98 || Graziella Grichting || Janet Hürlimann || Claudia Biner || Inger Müller || Erika Müller Erika Müller || (5th) |} ==Record as a coach of national teams== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Year ! scope="col"| Tournament, event ! scope="col"| National team ! scope="col"| Place |- | 2017 ||2017 Japanese Olympic Curling Trials|| Chiaki Matsumura ||runner-up |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Swiss female curlers Category:Swiss curling champions Category:Swiss curling coaches Category:Canadian emigrants to Switzerland Category:Curlers from Ontario Category:Canadian women curlers Category:Canadian curling coaches Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
